animeTitle: Disciples Upgrade, I Become Stronger Just By Lying Down
otherNames: My disciple levels up and I become stronger just by lying down, Apprentice upgrades I become stronger just by lying down, Disciples Upgrade I Become Stronger Just By Lying Down, 徒弟升级 我躺着就变强
synopsis: Zhang Yijian unexpectedly transmigrated to a cultivation world and gained a system that grants him various divine-level techniques and treasures every day. However, without any cultivation, Zhang Yijian suffered constant humiliation. It wasn’t until the Tianyan Sect held its disciple recruitment ceremony that he awakened the full functionality of the system. As long as he took in disciples, their cultivation would be returned to him multiplied. From then on, Zhang Yijian’s path of cultivation underwent a dramatic transformation.
